title: 装了球体世界MOD之后...
author: mr21e
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; ModLoader has failed to initialize.
This error has been saved to E:\MineCraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-19_02.19.06-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT b0b9d4a4 --------
Generated 12-8-19 上午2:19

- Minecraft Version: 1.3.1
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 8212168 bytes (7 MB) / 38490112 bytes (36 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
- JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
- ModLoader: Mods loaded: 6
ModLoader 1.3.1
mod_InvTweaks 1.42 (1.3.1)
mod_ReiMinimap v3.2_05汉化by大刘 [1.3.1]
mod_TooManyItems 1.3.1 2012-08-01
mod_CuteMobModels 1.3.1
mod_Biosphere 1.3.1


java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access method uz.<init>(ILjava/lang/String;)V from class BiosphereGenerator
        at BiosphereGenerator.<init>(BiosphereGenerator.java:7)
        at mod_Biosphere.load(mod_Biosphere.java:19)
        at ModLoader.init(ModLoader.java:922)
        at ModLoader.addAllRenderers(ModLoader.java:169)
        at avx.<init>(RenderManager.java:86)
        at avx.<clinit>(RenderManager.java:12)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:424)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:768)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 783e07ea ----------



求助啊,ml和am都装了,打开显示那个MOJANG页面卡住一会,就弹出上面的东西

replies.author: 焘奇
replies.txt_content: 悲剧的少年，没有内存了。。。。。｛我是说好像｝
